mapper.select: SELECT u.idn_user as idn_user, ug.idn_user_group as idn_user_group, ugt.type_code as type_code, ugt.type_desc as type_desc, u.user_name as user_name_db, ug.user_group_id as user_group_id FROM tpa_tuser u, tpa_tuser_group ug, tpa_tuser_group_type ugt WHERE u.user_id = #{user_id} AND u.idn_user_group = ug.idn_user_group AND ug.idn_user_group_type = ugt.idn_user_group_type
